app.title: FastQuiz
app.uploadDesc: Upload a CSV file to automatically generate an interactive quiz. The format is flexible and supports multiple correct answers.

upload.errorExtension: Please upload a file with .csv extension
upload.errorProcessing: An error occurred while processing the file.
upload.errorEmpty: The CSV file does not contain valid questions or has an incorrect format.

editor.cancelMessage: If you leave now, you will lose all unsaved changes.
